special_4.name: Charm of Wumbo

special_5.description: Maybe together, they make 1 non-flimsy rope.

special_6.name: Poison Charm
special_6.description: This charm prevents a certain purple bad active effect. Perhaps food poisoning by grapes?

special_9.description: Pot of Grumbo lets me battle two MORE times!

special_10.name: Grumbot Miner
special_10.description: Spend gold to make gold! That's what the Grumbot Miner will do for you!
